text: The men's 4 × 400 metres relay event at the 1978 Commonwealth Games was held on 11 and 12 August at the Commonwealth Stadium in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==Medalists== {| |- |width=200 valign=top|' Washington Njiri Daniel Kimaiyo Bill Koskei Joel Ngetich |width=200 valign=top|' Clive Barriffe Bertland Cameron Colin Bradford Floyd Brown Seymour Newman* |width=200 valign=top|' John Higham Chum Darvall Garry Brown Rick Mitchell |} *Athletes who competed in heats only ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 3 teams of each heat (Q) plus the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;font-size:95%" |- !Rank !! Heat !! Nation !! Athletes !! Time !! Notes |- | || align=left| || align=left|Washington Njiri, Daniel Kimaiyo, Bill Koskei, Joel Ngetich || 3:03.54 || |- | || align=left| || align=left|Clive Barriffe, Bertland Cameron, Colin Bradford, Floyd Brown || 3:04.00 || |- | || align=left| || align=left|John Higham, Chum Darvall, Garry Brown, Rick Mitchell || 3:04.23 || |- | 4 || align=left| || align=left|Frank Van Doorn, Brian Saunders, Dacre Bowen, Glenn Bogue || 3:05.94 || |- | 5 || align=left| || align=left|Joseph Coombs, Mike Solomon, Mike Paul, Roy Astor || 3:06.73 || |- | 6 || align=left| || align=left|Roger Jenkins, Paul Forbes, Peter Hoffman, David Jenkins || 3:07.73 || |- | 7 || align=left| || align=left|Elroy Turner, Cuthbert Jacobs, Lester Flax, Fred Sowerby || 3:10.45 || |- | || align=left| || align=left|Terry Whitehead, Alan Pascoe, Glen Cohen, Richard Ashton || ||England had originally finished first in the same time as Kenya but were disqualified for jostling with the Kenyan team on the third leg |} ==References== *Heats results (The Canberra Times) *Final results (The Canberra Times) *Australian results Category:Athletics at the 1978 Commonwealth Games 1978
title: Athletics at the 1978 Commonwealth Games – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
